Private Member Functions

 DISALLOW_COPY_AND_ASSIGN (ComposePathEffect)

Detailed Description

Construct a PathEffect whose effect is to apply first the inner effect and the the outer pathEffect (e.g.

outer(inner(path))). 

 //create a base object - PathEffect
 PathEffect pe;
 //create a polymorphism object - ComposePathEffect
 pe = new ComposePathEffect(outer_path, inner_path);
 paint.setPathEffect(pe);
 //draw on canvas
 canvas->drawPath(path, paint);
